entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
